subject: Don't waste your time. Cheap pills are here.
body:
Dear valued member.
We are writing to inform you about a new offer of MyCanadianPharmacy. Now you can take care of your health for less - just switch on to Canadian drugs.
Canadian product is not in any ways less qualitative - the country imposes lower taxes on pharmaceutical industry, so the prime cost for making drugs is so much lower than in the USA. It really does pay to buy Canadian products instead of American ones - and it is as effective.
Visit our licensed shop to learn more about Spring Specials. http://www.isfive.hk
-------------------------------------------
Best regards,Angie Hoovere-mail: dwbetterbyphonem@betterbyphone.dewww: http://www.isfive.hk
